channel.title: Run Server Error
channel.description:
Hi, i recently added Silab names and bonus' to Item.cfg. I no u can download it but that didn't work for me so i added some my self. Then i compile and run server. And this comes up.
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28)[/code] Can anyone help me?

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

You’re probably missing a number in one of the Item IDs in item.cfg or you didn’t space it out enough

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
